title: poster feedback!
content:
This is the final poster Iâ€™m going to post that I made for the global studies presentation on the internet, this one is talking about the idea of limitless information made by possible by the internet and sites like google.com. let me know what you think!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123095221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture2_6342.png)
author: Eli Jager

comments.content: This would work better in a different face. Your other posters felt like solid professional work, this piece feels rushed. Finding type that fits the idea would help bring it home.
